mode.description: 模式选择，"single-column"-单列模式，"mutil-column"-多列模式，"mutil-column-auto"-多列联动模式
mode.description_zh: 模式选择，"single-column"-单列模式，"mutil-column"-多列模式，"mutil-column-auto"-多列联动模式

:list.description: Column data, in array form, see description above
:list.description_zh: 列数据，数组形式，见上方说明

:v-model.description: A Boolean variable that controls the popping up and collapse of the selector
:v-model.description_zh: 布尔值变量，用于控制选择器的弹出与收起

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

cancel-color.description: The color of the cancel button

confirm-color.description: Confirm the color of the button

default-value.description: The default selected subscripts are provided, as described above
default-value.description_zh: 提供的默认选中的下标，见上方说明

mask-close-able.description: Whether or not to allow Picker to be turned off by clicking on the mask
mask-close-able.description_zh: 是否允许通过点击遮罩关闭Picker

z-index.description: The value of the z-index when it pops up

value-name.description: Customize the value attribute name of the list data to 1.3.6

label-name.description: Customize the label attribute name of the list data to 1.3.6

child-name.description: The children attribute name of the custom list data is valid only for the multi-column linkage mode 1.3.6
child-name.description_zh: 自定义list数据的children属性名，只对多列联动模式有效 1.3.6

confirm-text.description: Confirm the text of the button

cancel-text.description: The text of the cancel button
